channel.title: Shops, and Weapons Help [I'm not a noob.. I CAN code]
channel.description: Ok first off, I'm not retarded.. I'm not gonna come in Moparscape forums, and ask a dumb ass questions.. like "HOW TO I MOVE AN NPC?! AMG!!SHIFT+1!!!" But, I just need help with 2 things.. Small things.. Hopefully. I need to change the sellback price of an item.. Don't say in your shops.cfg, or items.cfg, because I'm pretty sure thats not it.. And if it really is, can you take a pic of exactally which spot it would be for the sellback? I don't want a pic of the whole item line, I wanna know which spot would be the sellback price, and where I locate it.. The other thing is, knives.. I posted a thread about this like a month ago and no1 answered it.. like 30 views, but no answers.. thanks.. I just wanna add knives, how do I go upon doing this.. Thanks everyone.. Please help meh.. pl0x..

item.title: Shops, and Weapons Help [I'm not a noob.. I CAN code]

item.description:
@FuryofEdge wrote:

Ok first off, I’m not retarded… I’m not gonna come in Moparscape forums, and ask a dumb ass questions… like “HOW TO I MOVE AN NPC?! AMG!!SHIFT+1!!!” But, I just need help with 2 things… Small things… Hopefully. I need to change the sellback price of an item… Don’t say in your shops.cfg, or items.cfg, because I’m pretty sure thats not it… And if it really is, can you take a pic of exactally which spot it would be for the sellback? I don’t want a pic of the whole item line, I wanna know which spot would be the sellback price, and where I locate it… The other thing is, knives… I posted a thread about this like a month ago and no1 answered it… like 30 views, but no answers… thanks… I just wanna add knives, how do I go upon doing this… Thanks everyone… Please help meh… pl0x…
